full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA GSER 'OD DAM PA MDO SDE'I DBANG PO'I RGYAL PO ZHES BYA BA THEG PA CHEN PO'I MDO BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @217B 'PHAGS PA GSER 'OD DAM PA MDO SDE'I DBANG PO'I RGYAL PO ZHES BYA BA THEG PA CHEN PO'I RDZOGS S+HO,, ,,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO DZI NA MI TRA DANG, SH'I LA AIN DRA PO DHI DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LO TZTSA BA BANDE YE SHES SDES ZHUS TE, SKAD GSAR BCAD KYIS BCOS NAS GTAN LA PHAB PO, ,` ZHES PA 'DI NI CHOS SDE CHEN PO SKU GSUM PHUN TSOGS GLING DU DPAR DU BSGRUBS PA'O, ,) @218A *, ,AOm SVA STI, THUB PA'I GSUNG MCHOG GSER 'OD DAM PA YI, ,MDO SDE DBANG PO RGYAL PO ZHES BYA 'DI, ,DPAR DU SGRUB PA'I SBYIN PA'I BDAG PO RNAMS, ,DANG GTONG LA SOGS BSNGAGS 'OS YON TAN GYIS, ,RAB TU LEGS PAR BRGYAN PA'I TZO RIG THU, ,CHIN GER RGYAL PO'I RIGS RGYUD KYI THAS CE, ,THU SAL AG CHE THU RU MUNG KHE DANG, 'DI GCEN BTZUN PA GSER BYED RNAM GNYIS DANG, ,DPAR DU RKO MKHAN DGE SLONG THOGS MED DANG, ,DAD LDAN KHYIM PA RDO RJE RNAM GNYIS DANG, ,DPAR GYI ZHUS DAG BYED PA'I DKA' BCU PA, ,DBU MDZAD DGE SLONG CHOS LDAN RDO RJE SOGS, ,DPAR 'DI SGRUB LA 'BREL PA THOB TSAD KYIS, ,MTSON PA'I MA RGAN 'GRO BA MA LUS PA, DPAR 'DI SGRUB PA'I RNAM DKAR DGE BA'I MTHUS, ,GNAS SKABS 'DI'ANG PHYI MA'I RGUD KUN ZHI, ,SRID ZHI'I LEGS TSOGS DPAL LA LONGS SPYOD SHOG ,'DI NAS PHYI MAR DAG PA'I ZHING KHAMS DANG, ,KHYAD PAR DPAL LDAN SHAMBHA LAR SKYES NAS, ,RIGS LDAN [???] YI DPAL A SPYOD PAR SHOG , ,,DPAR BYANG 'DI YANG ^MKHAN CHEN NO MON HAN, ,MCHOG SPRUL BLO BZANG MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA'O, ,DGE 'DIS BSTAN 'GRO'I PHAN BDE 'PHEL BAR SHOG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,
editor_(хянан_тохиолдуулагч): DZI NA MI TRA, SH'I LA AIN DRA PO DHI, YE SHES,
